Description:
Taking the initiative in general electrical maintenance works by promptly gauging organizational requirements.
Identify issues in different electrical systems using the appropriate tools and equipment.
Assemble, install and test electrical or electronic wiring.
Assemble and install distribution mechanisms and safety components to ensure a seamless workflow in the industry.
Carry out fault-finding check-ups of existing machinery to rectify any issues in their working.
Take charge of foolproof electrical system installation, repairing, and troubleshooting activities with utmost diligence.Skills
Skills:
Diploma in Associated Engineer or equivalent
Minimum of 5 years experience in transmission and distribution
Experience with DEWA or ADDC or AADC.
Candidate currently in the UAE and able to relocate to AL Ain are preferred
